meanings.definition: A person who operates a vehicle equipped with a device for spreading sand or salt on icy roads.
meanings.sent1: The gritters were out early this morning, making sure the roads were safe.
meanings.sent2: I saw the gritters driving by, spreading salt to melt the ice.
meanings.sent3: The gritters had a race to see who could cover the most ground with salt.
meanings.sent4: The gritters were like knights in shining armor, protecting the roads from icy dangers.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the gritters at work was a reassuring hum in the cold winter air.

meanings.definition: A machine or device used for spreading sand or salt on icy roads.
meanings.sent1: The gritters were lined up in the garage, ready to tackle the icy roads.
meanings.sent2: The city invested in new gritters to improve road safety during winter.
meanings.sent3: The gritters seemed to have a mind of their own, moving strategically to cover every inch of the road.
meanings.sent4: The gritters worked tirelessly, like silent heroes battling the icy conditions.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of the gritters stood out against the white snow, a beacon of safety.
